Package net.sf.jgcs.annotation

Defines optional annotations for messages.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PointToPoint
    Inform the protocol that the message can be delivered to a single destination.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SelfDelivery
    Inform the protocol whether message delivery to the sender can be omitted.

Package net.sf.jgcs.annotation Description

Defines optional annotations for messages. Annotations provide optional semantic information to the protocol. Each protocol may use it, or not, to optimize communication. Protocols should silently ignore unsupported annotations.
